languages.text: "Жаль, что мне уже не доведется провести допрос Ирлиэт. Я уверен, что ненавидевшая нас ксенос скрывала многое за своей фальшивой личиной".
"It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."
languages.original_text: "Жаль, что мне уже не доведется провести допрос Ирлиэт. Я уверен, что ненавидевшая нас ксенос скрывала многое за своей фальшивой личиной".

traits.locale_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “很遗憾，我再也没有机会审讯伊莉耶特了。那个异形对人类充满了憎恨，她虚假的外表下之下肯定隐藏了很多东西。”
languages.original_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我再也没有机会审讯伊莉耶特了。那个异形对人类充满了憎恨，她虚假的外表下之下肯定隐藏了很多东西。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Quel dommage que je n'aie plus la possibilité d'interroger Yrliet... Cette maudite xénos pleine de haine pour les humains devait cacher bien des secrets derrière son masque. »
languages.original_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."

traits.locale_text: « Quel dommage que je n'aie plus la possibilité d'interroger Yrliet... Cette maudite xénos pleine de haine pour les humains devait cacher bien des secrets derrière son masque. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Es una lástima pensar que no tendré ocasión de interrogar a Yrliet. Esa xenos debía de ocultar mucho bajo su falsa personalidad, aparte del odio a los humanos».
languages.original_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."

traits.locale_text: «Es una lástima pensar que no tendré ocasión de interrogar a Yrliet. Esa xenos debía de ocultar mucho bajo su falsa personalidad, aparte del odio a los humanos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ユリエットをもう一度異端審問にかけられなかったのは残念だ。あの人間狩りをする異種族なら、偽りの仮面の下にあれこれ隠していたのは間違いなかった」
languages.original_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットをもう一度異端審問にかけられなかったのは残念だ。あの人間狩りをする異種族なら、偽りの仮面の下にあれこれ隠していたのは間違いなかった」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist bedauerlich, dass ich keine weitere Gelegenheit bekommen werde, Yrliet zu verhören. Diese menschenhassende Xenos hat unter ihrer falschen Maske gewiss sehr viel verborgen."
languages.original_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist bedauerlich, dass ich keine weitere Gelegenheit bekommen werde, Yrliet zu verhören. Diese menschenhassende Xenos hat unter ihrer falschen Maske gewiss sehr viel verborgen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."

languages.text: "Yrliet'i bir kez daha sorgulama şansına erişemeyecek olmak üzücü. O insan düşmanı zeno, sahte karakterinin altında kesin birçok şey gizliyordu."
languages.original_text: "It is unfortunate that I will not have another chance to interrogate Yrliet. That human-hating xenos was surely hiding a great deal beneath her false persona."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet'i bir kez daha sorgulama şansına erişemeyecek olmak üzücü. O insan düşmanı zeno, sahte karakterinin altında birçok şey gizliyordu kesin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
